slope_base_flow_x2: Slope where base flow is doubled
ini_max_halvings: Max number of timestep halvings - initialisation
ini_max_iterations_x2: Max number of iterations after doubling - initialisation
ini_min_node_area: Min plan area at nodes - initialisation
ini_scaling_volbal: Volume balance tolerance scaling factor - initialisation
sim_max_halvings: Max number of timestep halvings - simulation
sim_max_iterations_x2: Max number of iterations after doubling - simulation
sim_min_node_area: Min plan area at nodes - simulation
sim_scaling_volbal: Volume balance tolerance scaling factor - simulation
use_full_area_for_hl: Use full area for headloss calculations
ini_relax_tol: Relax tolerance from run t/s - initialisation
sim_relax_tol: Relax tolerance from run t/s - simulation
